name: apple
description: A sweet red fruit that is often eaten raw or used in desserts.

name: banana
description: A long yellow fruit that is soft and sweet, often eaten as a snack.

name: cherry
description: A small red fruit with a pit, often used in pies and desserts.

name: date
description: A sweet brown fruit that is often dried and eaten as a snack.

name: elderberry
description: A small dark purple fruit that is often used in syrups and jams.
